Articles.Content:
Here are some sketches i have drawn in IOS that are KSP related, both feature my personal KSP country New Kerbaldonia.

A Rebel jet falls under a modifed Aeris 3 Counter insurgency aircraft, this was the pilots 3rd victory against Old Kerbaldonian Insurgents.

A test flight goes wrong, and a Aircraft flying out of the KSC Aircraft test centre breaks up, the pilot ejected safely, but the jet was destroyed.
These look great what application did you use?
Tanuki Sketch, everything was on the free version.
